metadata.feature_description: Export analytics data to various formats for external analysis

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to PersonaBar > Dashboard
steps.expected: Dashboard panel should open with analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard panel opened showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.action: Hovered over Dashboard and selected Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard should load with module tabs and Export button
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard loaded showing Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki tabs with Export button visible at top right

steps.action: Clicked the Export button in the Answers module section
steps.expected: Excel file should download with analytics data
steps.actual: File 'Answers.xlsx' (10,245 bytes) was successfully downloaded to the browser

observations: The export functionality exports to Excel format (.xlsx) only - no CSV option visible in the UI
Each module section (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) has its own Export button that exports data specific to that module
The exported filename is automatically generated based on the module name (e.g., 'Answers.xlsx' for the Answers module)
The export uses the SpreadsheetExport/Excel API endpoint with parameters for period, date range, and module name
Export permissions are implicitly handled through the PersonaBar menu permissions (Administrators and Community Manager roles)
